translations: 杂食的；什么都读的；无所不吃的

sentences.sentence: Brown bears are omnivorous, eating anything that they can get their paws on.
sentences.translation: 棕熊是杂食动物，抓到什么吃什么。

sentences.sentence: She has always been an omnivorous reader.
As a child, Coleridge developed omnivorous reading habits.
sentences.translation: 柯尔律治从孩提时期便养成了广泛阅读的习惯。
